name: A:nidu
description:
Story

 The souls of animal dust dolls woke up at the souvenir shop🎁!  They turned out to be super heroes. Cooperation is a must! Let's use different superpowers to get out of the factory and explore the world.

Characteristics

1. As if you're a super hero!
The four dolls that escaped from the souvenir shop have different superpowers. Let's solve the quiz using superpowers!

2. Cooperation is a must to carry out the story!
You can't escape alone! Escape considering the superpower combination. Players, who are dust dolls, can stick together, so if you can't get through it alone, let's unite and move forward together.

3. Use superpowers to solve quizzes that you've never seen before!
Let's solve the quizzes using superpowers.

4. Cute drawing style.
A game that combines cute drawings, puzzles, and adventure genres.

The current version is the A:nidu prototype version. In the Release version, we will support online multi-play, not local play, and more interesting content will be waiting. Please look forward to it and show your interest.😁😁

It's very helpful if you send us your feedback. Thank you

English ver. https://forms.gle/68nhQVV9ASrwwMRn8

Korean ver. https://forms.gle/31SdSLsvQjf5Saj86
